analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 22.13. Kusalattika, Niyyānikaduka🔽Nakusalaṁ naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo niyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalattika niyyānikaduka  na kusalam na niyyānikam dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ niyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The reverse order of the law of conditionality, the text of the Paṭṭhāna according to the method of the Triads and Dyads🔽A wholesome and a not-leading-out state is a condition, as root-cause condition, for a wholesome and a leading-out state. …

original: Naakusalaṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naabyākataṁ naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Naakusalaṁ naaniyyānikañca naabyākataṁ naaniyyānikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato aniyyāniko
analyzed: na akusalam na aniyyānikam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  na abyākatam na aniyyānikam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyyānikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  na akusalam na aniyyānikam ca na abyākatam na aniyyānikam ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ aniyyānikaḥ
translated: A not-wholesome and a not-leading-out state is a condition, as root-cause condition, for an indeterminate and a not-leading-out state.🔽An indeterminate and a not-leading-out state is a condition, as root-cause condition, for an indeterminate and a not-leading-out state.🔽A not-wholesome and a not-leading-out state and an indeterminate and a not-leading-out state are conditions, as root-cause condition, for an indeterminate and a not-leading-out state. …

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: There are three under root-cause condition, three under predominance condition, … three under absence condition.
